Key Match Events: West Indies scored 135 for 8 in their innings
South Africa chased down the target of 123 in 16.1 overs
Andre Russell took 2 wickets in the second over
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies were knocked out of the T20 World Cup
South Africa top group II of the Super Eight phase with a perfect six points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a virtual quarterfinal
The target was reduced to 123 in 17 overs via the DLS method due to a rain delay
Others: Roston Chase was the standout player for West Indies with bat and ball and top-scored with 52
Kyle Mayers came in for the under-fire Johnson Charles atop the order and made 35
Tabraiz Shamsi was named Man of the Match
